headline.main: R.A.F. QUITS RUSSIA, HURRICANES STAY; Returning Britons Say Allies Are Now Adept in Use of New 12-Gun Fighters 4 RECEIVE DECORATIONS Fliers Bagged 15 Nazis, Never Lost an Escorted Bomber -- Mission Over, New Task Set

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 1 -- With announcements of decorations for three officers of the Royal Air Force Wing sent to Russia shortly after the German drive began, it was revealed today that the Wing had returned some weeks ago.
abstract: RAF unit returns to Brit after completing USSR mission; fighting role revd; Wing Comdr Ramsbottom-Isherwood, Squadron Leaders Rook and Miller get Lenin Order and Brit Flying Cross awards; Sgt Pilot Howe gets former award
snippet: LONDON, March 1 -- With announcements of decorations for three officers of the Royal Air Force Wing sent to Russia shortly after the German drive began, it was revealed today that the Wing had returned some weeks ago....

byline.original: By CRAIG THOMPSONSpecial Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES
